name: Tapioca Hunter
description:
Global Game Jam 2023 – Theme: Roots

Hunt for tapiocas, but beware! There are ghosts around!

Needs either a Sega Genesis/Mega Drive emulator or actual hardware to run.

This project was developed for the Global Game Jam 2023 – Baixada Santista (Etec Aristóteles Ferreira).

Credits
  • Programming by Danilo & Andre
  • Graphic/Music by Marcio
Special Thanks

  • Andrew DeRosier
